::Necromancer/Hell Drak/Decadel::

    Necromancer and Hell Drak were back =
on the ground again, both in robot mode.  

     "Damn.  Well, at least we =
know what to expect next time we feel like slaggin' that bitch," Hell Drak =
mouthed, the typical her.

     Necromancer nodded a tiny bit, then sighed.=
..
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
        Mea=
nwhile, Decadel was wandering around.  He looked in the distance and saw Sy=
mphony over in the corner, but couldn't make out what he was saying.  Decad=
el was thinking about using a worm and how it was the perfect chance to cha=
nge Symphony into a Terracon, but then he figured Symphony was too much of =
a softy and a weakling, and walked on...



~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
~~~~~~~=
LurkerAbyss~~~~~~~
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
~The Keeper Of Souls~
~The Shado=
w Of The Dark~
~I Am The Lurker Of The Abyss~
